title: Die September 29. 1642. The Lords and Commons in Parliament do conceive and find it so necessary that 1000. dragoones, with some troopes of horse should be raised speedily, ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament.
publisher: by L.N. for E. Husbands and I. Frank, and are to be sold at their shops in the Middle Temple, and next dore to the Kings Haed [sic] in Fleetstreete,
